name: Bandori Party: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party Shorts
Samejima-san wa Kamishimetai
tags: Long Strip,Romance,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color

name: Terra Formars Gaiden - Asimov
nutshell: Sent to track down and exterminate a monstrous man with the Mosaic Organ Operation., Asimov soon finds himself fighting an old friend.

name: Sailor Moon - How many times must I... (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Haruka x Michiru

name: Replica
nutshell: While trying to find a job, Manji, a for-hire bodyguard, also known as "Akainu" (Red Dog), meets Karu who works for "CARDS." Discovering that Karu's mission is to exterminate the deadly "TOYs," which mindlessly attack any living things, Manji can't help but forcefully tag along to relieve his boredom…

name: Look Alike Daughter
nutshell:
"I think my mother is a killer." Gil So-Myeong, who has excellent grades, good manners, and an exemplary child, has lived as a perfect daughter according to the standards her mother demanded. However, on the day that her younger brother rises from the river as a corpse, a terrifying suspicion rises in So-Myeong's mind. A cruel mother-daughter thriller between a mother who tries to get rid of everything that interferes with her child's life and a daughter who tries to escape from her!
*Note: You may need to change the settings to "fit width" in order to read pleasantly.

name: Rainy Girl and Sunny Boy
nutshell:
Absolute rainy girl vs absolute sunny boy

Author's Pixiv
Author's Twitter

name: Anaerobic Love: Deep Sea Prisoner
nutshell: Bin He has an unrequited love for his best friend, Hai. During their Uni graduation trip, Bin He was feeling down because his best friend is finally going to pursue the girl he likes. They decide to have a friendly diving competition. While diving , Bin He sees a man chained to a shipwreck at the bottom of the sea. Beneath the sea begins an anaerobic love. What will be born from this fateful meeting?

name: How to Start a Relationship With Crossdressing
nutshell: Ako Kobayashi is a high school girl eagerly awaiting her prince charming to sweep her off her feet, but she has to overcome one small problem: she is so afraid of guys that she breaks out in hives whenever she comes near one. She even rejects the popular Kei Kitaooji who is the first guy to ever ask her out. However, after Kei learns of Ako's condition, he comes to school the next day dressed as a girl and asks her out again.

name: Lost World (Private Ed.)
nutshell:
The original version of Lost World done in Tezuka's middle school days. Very close to the final version, but has a number of differences - among other things, Kenichi is an adult instead of a kid.

Volumes 360 and 361 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works

name: Unsound Relationship
nutshell: The hot-tempered criminal investigative captain Qiancuo, and the high-IQ cold-blooded detective Teng Ruiyu, solve countless mysteries until they get caught up with a chain murder from two years ago…

name: BanG Dream! - The New Staff Saw Us! (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Everyone gets a turn!
Kaoru/Chisato/Misaki/Kanon + Ran/Tsugumi + Sayo/Hina vs Carrot + Saaya/Arisa + RanLisa & New Staff!
Links:

Author's Pixiv
Author's Twitter

name: Mad Summer School
nutshell: It is a scorching summer in Japan and Hiromi is studying hard for her exams as she wants to enter her university of choice. She was raised by her mother, because her father, a well known researcher, had gone missing when she was much younger. One day, on her way to school, she was attacked by a man with a knife… is this the end or a new beginning?

name: The Exorcism Expert
nutshell: When I pulled the book of forbidden knowledge from the shelves of the city library, I watched, helpless and terrified, as my life blasted off into another railroad of crazy eating words. And along the way, I ran over some mantis-ridden trash.

name: Host no Furachi na Love Game
nutshell: Haruka has always been admiring the No.1 host of that industry, so he entered a high-class host club to take an apprenticeship. However, the picture of the No.1 getting pasted there wasn’t the man he admires but Ryou, a super self-centered host who emits an overwhelming aura. Upon seeing Haruka’s rebellious attitude against Ryou’s arrogant behavior from the first sight, for some reasons, it was decided that Haruka would work at Ryou’s shop as a newbie―?

name: Schemer
nutshell: Only 4 hours after being dumped by the money-worshiping girlfriend, I became a murderer?! I thought I had erased all the evidence, yet the police still showed up… NO! For my mother on her sickbed and my bright future that yet to come, I can not get caught!!

name: Kemono wa Hana no Yume o Miru ka
nutshell:
When Hana's abusive father causes her to run away from home, she gets picked up by Takaya, the top host at a host club. Hana is soon attracted to Takaya, but can she find happiness with a host who is paid to hang out with women? Moreover, does Takaya care about what she thinks?
Included oneshots (vol. 2):

Otona no Douwa (An Adult's Fairytale)
Himeta Ai (Hidden Love)

name: Oboreru Triangle
nutshell: Nao, a university student, lives with his childhood otaku friend, Subaru. Since his female friends declined his invitation to hang out, Nao decided to pick up some random girl instead. Charmed by her smile, he succeeded. Except that this girl he dated for a day, Azusa, turned out to be a guy. Their relationship progresses smoothly until Subaru steps in…

name: The Kabocha Wine - Another
nutshell:
Petit par la taille, mais grand par le cœur, Shunsuke Aoba nous embarque dans son quotidien de lycéen déjanté de l’Académie Sunshine. Entre les rigolades amicales et les défis sportifs, il y a bien sûr Natsumi Asaoka. Grande et gentille, « L. », comme on la surnomme, est prête à tout pour lui prouver son amour...
Suite de "The Kabocha Wine - Sequel"

name: 12 Renkyuu
nutshell: A collection of 12 short stories (& one extra) by Yoshida Satoru. The first features a woman who quit her job one summer, and is trying to find a happier life. The next few feature an unconventional method of getting rid of a ghost, and some annoying peeping neighbors who underestimate the cleverness of their large-chested target.

name: Tiger & Bunny - Kimi to Iru to Naseka Shiawase (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Barnaby x Kotetsu

name: Lupin III Jr.
nutshell: Lupin Jr., the illegitimate kid son of Lupin III, stops criminals, steals valuables, and attempts to discover the mystery of wherever his dad went, along with the help of his gal pal Marilyn.

name: Ghost +62
tags: Official Colored,Ghosts,Long Strip,Comedy,Horror,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: Becoming a ghost in the after-life? Powpow starts his life as a handsome ghost together with his ghostly friends!

name: Poor Poor Lips
nutshell: Nako is a poverty-stricken 21 year-old in desperate need of a job. She applies for a job at a jewelry store. When shop owner Ren identifies herself as a lesbian, the competition for the position evaporates, leaving only Nako. Ren asks her if her sexual orientation will be a problem, Nako sensibly replies that she's not interested, so she doesn't see any problem.

name: New life: Savior From Another World
nutshell: It was a peaceful life for humanity. Protected by the order of valiant knights they could be sure the randomly appearing gates to other worlds will be closed, and if any monsters slip through, they will be immediately caught. But on that day everything went wrong. The portal gates wouldn’t seal up. The guest from another world wouldn’t obey. The young knight was suspected to be self-proclaimed, which led to his imprisonment in a monster detention prison. His seemingly imminent death led to a new beginning. That day is carved into humanity history as future-changing. The day when the portal gates were forced open.

name: Official Crossover Legend: Fukumoto All Stars
nutshell:
In the suburbs of M City, a town full of people with unusual personalities, all kinds of extraordinary slapstick incidents are taking place on a daily basis. Gambler Itou Kaiji lives as a NEET and is treated as a useless member of society by the people around him, but he is unable to reform. In the meantime, Akagi Shigeru (13), Akagi Shigeru (19), and Akagi Shigeru (Man of the Divine Realm) are living as part of the Akagi residence and causing trouble around them.
In addition, the old villains including Hyoudou Kazutaka and Washizu Iwao are enjoying shady events at the retirement home Espoir, while Hirai Ginji, the head of the neighborhood association, is scheming to make money, and genius boy Ukai Zero has confrontations with Shirube at the arcades.

name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn! dj - Kyou no Otenki
Koi wa Tsuzuku yo Dokomade mo
nutshell:
Five years ago Sakura Nanase had a fateful encounter with Dr Kairi Tendou. Determined to meet her destined prince again she studied hard and is finally appointed as a rookie nurse at the hospital he works at…
This is the beginning of her days of happiness! Or that's what she thought until their meeting shakes things up…

name: Life Cry
tags: Monsters,Action,Long Strip,Adventure,Virtual Reality,Video Games,Drama,Fantasy,Web Comic,Supernatural,Adaptation,Full Color
nutshell:
In year 2088 AD, the Arahan company materialized all five senses
And released a virtual reality game called ‘Life Cry’.
At the time Life Cry opened its door,
One dark gamer knocks on that door.
A gamer who digs up hidden secrets
Lime’s ‘Life Cry’ begins!


Official Japanese Translation

name: Saa Koi ni Ochitamae - Nakayoshi Nano (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Noboru and Yuuki explore the sexual side of their relationship.
